thread.section_title: Madeleine Haussmann Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Little Gem in Paris
thread.title_full: Little Gem in Paris - Review of Madeleine Haussmann Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Fio_1080
title: Little Gem in Paris
text:
Hotel staffs are all friendly and helpful! I was upgraded to superior room, which is spacious, clean, well-equipped, facing inner courtyard and no street noises at all. Double-door design at room entrance which means you hardly hear noise from corridor as well. Bed also very comfortable and I would like to make it home in Paris.
Location is excellent, 5 mins to Galleries Lafayette, few minutes to Madeleine metro station, lots of good cafe & restaurant nearby.
Reasonable room rate but in high quality of everything. Highly recommended.
